verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> of David יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD קְ֭רָאתִיךָ <S%H7121><s%> I cry ח֣וּשָׁה <S%H2363><s%> unto thee make haste לִּ֑י הַאֲזִ֥ינָה <S%H238><s%> unto me give ear ק֝וֹלִ֗י <S%H6963><s%> unto my voice בְּקָרְאִי־ <S%H7121><s%> when I cry לָֽךְ׃

תִּכּ֤וֹן <S%H3559><s%> be set forth תְּפִלָּתִ֣י <S%H8605><s%> Let my prayer קְטֹ֣רֶת <S%H7004><s%> thee [as] incense לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before מַֽשְׂאַ֥ת <S%H4864><s%> [and] the lifting up כַּ֝פַּ֗י <S%H3709><s%> of my hands מִנְחַת־ <S%H4503><s%> sacrifice עָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> [as] the evening

שִׁיתָ֣ה <S%H7896><s%> Set יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD שָׁמְרָ֣ה <S%H8108><s%> a watch לְפִ֑י <S%H6310><s%> before my mouth נִ֝צְּרָ֗ה <S%H5341><s%> keep עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over דַּ֥ל <S%H1817><s%> the door שְׂפָתָֽי׃ <S%H8193><s%> of my lips אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּט־ <S%H5186><s%> afternoon

לִבִּ֨י <S%H3820><s%> not my heart לְדָבָ֪ר ׀ <S%H1697><s%> thing רָ֡ע <S%H7451><s%> to [any] evil לְהִתְע֘וֹלֵ֤ל <S%H5953><s%> to practise עֲלִל֨וֹת ׀ <S%H5949><s%> works בְּרֶ֗שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> wicked אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for אִישִׁ֥ים <S%H582><s%> who פֹּֽעֲלֵי־ <S%H6466><s%> that work אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> iniquity וּבַל־ <S%H1077><s%> lest אֶ֝לְחַ֗ם <S%H3898><s%> and let me not eat בְּמַנְעַמֵּיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4516><s%> of their dainties

יֶֽהֶלְמֵֽנִי־ <S%H1986><s%> smite צַדִּ֨יק ׀ <S%H6662><s%> Let the righteous חֶ֡סֶד <S%H2617><s%> me [it shall be] a kindness וְֽיוֹכִיחֵ֗נִי <S%H3198><s%> and let him reprove שֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil רֹ֭אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> me [it shall be] an excellent אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יָנִ֣י <S%H5106><s%> [which] shall not break רֹאשִׁ֑י <S%H7218><s%> my head כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> still וּ֝תְפִלָּתִ֗י <S%H8605><s%> for yet my prayer בְּרָעוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H7451><s%> also [shall be] in their calamities

נִשְׁמְט֣וּ <S%H8058><s%> are overthrown בִֽידֵי־ <S%H3027><s%> places סֶ֭לַע <S%H5553><s%> in stony שֹׁפְטֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H8199><s%> When their judges וְשָׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> they shall hear אֲ֝מָרַ֗י <S%H561><s%> my words כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for נָעֵֽמוּ׃ <S%H5276><s%> for they are sweet

כְּמ֤וֹ <S%H3644><s%> one פֹלֵ֣חַ <S%H6398><s%> as when one cutteth וּבֹקֵ֣עַ <S%H1234><s%> and cleaveth בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [wood] upon the earth נִפְזְר֥וּ <S%H6340><s%> are scattered עֲ֝צָמֵ֗ינוּ <S%H6106><s%> Our bones לְפִ֣י <S%H6310><s%> mouth שְׁאֽוֹל׃ <S%H7585><s%> at the grave's

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵלֶ֨יךָ ׀ <S%H413><s%> are toward יְהוִ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord עֵינָ֑י <S%H5869><s%> But mine eyes בְּכָ֥ה חָ֝סִ֗יתִי <S%H2620><s%> in thee is my trust אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּעַ֥ר <S%H6168><s%> destitute נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> not my soul

שָׁמְרֵ֗נִי <S%H8104><s%> Keep מִ֣ידֵי <S%H3027><s%> the jaws פַ֭ח <S%H6341><s%> of the trap יָ֣קְשׁוּ <S%H3369><s%> [which] they have laid לִ֑י וּ֝מֹקְשׁ֗וֹת <S%H4170><s%> for me and the gins פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> of the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> of iniquity

יִפְּל֣וּ <S%H5307><s%> fall בְמַכְמֹרָ֣יו <S%H4364><s%> into their own nets רְשָׁעִ֑ים <S%H7563><s%> Let the wicked יַ֥חַד <S%H3162><s%> whilst that I withal אָ֝נֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> I עַֽד־ <S%H5704><s%> While אֶעֱבֽוֹר׃ <S%H5674><s%> escape
